document_data.mainbody:
St. Carwells Vale was a tiny village hidden in the Hamlar Hills of Amn.
The village was hidden in a grassy vale amid the western Hamlar Hills towards the coast, northwest from Mount Speartop.
A wood and stone sanctuary with a mineral water spring lay in the middle of the village, a shrine to Eldath overseen by Baniol the Peaceful. St. Carwells Hospice was a small hospital operated by Baniols friend Rhynda, a priest of Ilmater. Between the two of them, the Vale was a refuge for any who sought it.
